google_play_reviews.content: I love this app!
Great app.must try
Simple and fun
Gets kinda boring. Add more to the options!
Once upon a time i was able to adjust the brush size... Now i am not able to. Tweek this app for brush size & Flower density and i would buy this app Thanks
Beautiful idea and implementation. Can you enable us to control the flower density / frequency too?
I love this app, AWESOME.

Very few options, the music can be heard more in the left headphone than 
the other (yes, my headphones are working). There are no ads so far. It's 
relaxing, I wish the music could be played ok with headphones.

What a beautiful little app! P!ease develop it more, would certainly not mind paying for expanded functions and choices! Update Feb 2018. Love this app, wish the developer would add some updates.
Beautiful and meditative. Share button only send some text and link. Image drawn by me weren't attached, as I expected, that's not disappointing, i lost all signatures i made work this app.
I would give it 5 stars ... just fix an infinite flowers bug . Sometimes app starts to keep on generating flowers on end of curves until we just dont clear it all please fix it
There needs to be an option to enable the level decrease after strokes

Beautiful and relaxing. I get why there's no save or undo, but I do wish I could choose from more line colors, and choose background color. At least add green lines so the flowers can come off of vines?
Good zen app, but the music should keep going in the background for a calmer experience, maybe more backgrounds too? Not much to do after about 1 minute of gameplay.
Needs improve..but its cute...thanks

This is really nice! I honestly don't know what else to say.
It but need more settings and interesting creations..... I love it...
Gorgeous app, please keep improving the features and then charge for it after 20 free uses.  ;) I'll buy!
Good but. ..  2 stars.
So peaceful....
Simple yet classic .

Better than any wallpaper i could find for my 10.1 tablet, especially since I created it myself. Very simple program and easy to learn, quickly learned that finger pressure makes a difference as well as selecting different brush sizes. Much Mahalo from Hawaii, keep up the good work.

This is a bloody brilliant app. Love it but there are some drawbacks. It would be better if the music keeps playing all the time rather than playing while I draw a long line. There should be more flower options. The eraser should not be in the color option. The music is really soothing but it should be a bit loud. Apart from these things, I like it a lot.
Quite good. I love it!
Brilliant.
Zen...
Export quality very poor and no option to select size and also you cannot resize canvass
It is wonderful! I love it! It is so pretty and relaxing!
I neeeeeeed the music !!! I'm in love with this app<3
Actually it was fab Loved it Great
It's cute but soon becomes boring
No words
I have been using this for long time now and it is very relaxing. But I would like to see more with flowers and colors. It is really amazing.

I'm loving it, really nice and simple

Very cool apps!! Hope there will be new updates adding new colors & stuffs. Hope can set the flowers blooming quantity too! (Sometimes bloom too much covering the words or pictures) Good job & cheers!

So pretty, simple and relaxing. It's blissful (is that even a word) it makes me want to print  my designs on delicate paper and hand write love letters to soldiers fighting overseas and scent them with the blossoms that I'm writing with.

This is more fun than one would expect.  There are no challenges, no puzzles, but is a pleasing time waster.
I like it, but the music's too much. please add ambient soundscapes, and an option to mute music.

It is very nice and unique in Google Play. I hope it will provide a few more music selections, some Chinese/Japanese calligraphy brushes, some paper texture options and a few steps of undo capability.
What a fantastic app.
Very Beautifull
Absolutely wonderful concept. I would pay a couple dollars for this. My only complaint: please include an off switch for the music.
This app is very poetic. It stimulates the imagination and it is relaxing at the same time. I love it!

Audio is so low you can barely hear it..so you set your volume to max...then draw. Next thing you know it is so loud that your wondering if you need to get your hearing checked for damage. Volume controls that are not tied to drawing. .please!!!!
